notes.title: Data availability
notes.p:
All data is available on-line and free of charge. NCEP Reanalysis data provided by the NOAA/OAR/ESRL PSD, Boulder, Colorado, USA, from their Web site at https://www.esrl.noaa.gov/psd/. The ECMWF ERA-Interim reanalysis data is available at the European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts. The WPSH indices (including area, intensity, ridge position, northern boundary position and western ridge point index) can be obtained from the National Climate Center of China. The observational data of surface O 3 concentrations is available at http://106.37.208.233:20035.
